id.description: Unique identifier for the demographic answer option.

free_form.description: Specifies if the answer option allows for a free-form text input.

active.description: Indicates if the demographic answer option is currently active or not.

name.description: The name or label of the demographic answer option.

demographic_question_id.description: The ID of the demographic question associated with this answer option.

translations.description: Array of translations for the answer option names in different languages.

language.description: The language code of the translated name.

name.description: The translated name of the answer option in the specified language.
